overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a dynamic presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on topics related to computational social science, disinformation, and research opportunities. With a combined follower count of 3,580, his content generates engagement through likes, reposts, and comments, particularly on LinkedIn.

contentThemes.description: Posts about research and methods in computational social science.
Discussions on disinformation and coordinated inauthentic behavior.
Announcements for new research positions and grants.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on high-engagement topics like research grants and disinformation.
Enhance visual content and infographics to boost engagement, especially on platforms like LinkedIn.

platformInsights.bluesky: Effective for sharing research publications and upcoming presentation details.
